Audio.Locality: Boa Nova, Wet Forest, state of Bahia
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Humid forest. At the end a second bird sings further off. The long song is given by the male, the short song by the female.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Trogon surrucura,Todirostrum poliocephalum,Piprites chloris,Contopus cinereus,Colonia colonus
